title: Tick Board Cloud - Hosted multi-board service
description:
Commercial SaaS service for accessing tick boards from anywhere.

Users run tickboard locally, it auto-connects to tickboard.io. Users login to web dashboard and see all their boards across all machines. Full kanban UI with live updates, no setup required.

Stack: Cloudflare Workers, Durable Objects, KV/D1, Pages

Architecture:
- Local tickboard connects outbound (wss) on startup if token configured
- Cloud maintains WebSocket hub, relays HTTP requests
- Dashboard aggregates all user's boards
- Live updates via SSE over the tunnel
